articles.description: Gold Rate Today: Check gold prices in different cities on May 20, 2024 in Rs/10 grams
articles.content: Gold Rate Today In India: On May 20, the cost of 10 grams of gold held firm, hovering around Rs 74,000. Pure 24-carat gold was valued at Rs 74,610 per 10 grams, with 22-carat gold maintaining its pri… [+1810 chars]
